entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DOTNET_EnableDiagnostics=0 disables profiling in .NET 8 #96227
  • .NET 8 ReadyToRun regression bug: TypeLoadException #96225
  • [Fuzzlyn] Assert failure "SanityCheck()" on OS X ARM64 #96224
    9.0.0
  • HttpClient: Deadlock in `SendAsync` when `AllowDuplex` is true under specific conditions #96223
  • string.IndexOf(string) poor performance in other cultures #96221
  • Potential Deadlock When Disposing EventListeners Concurrently #96219
  • ISerializable documentation claims it works with XmlSerializer #96218
  • [API Proposal]: Enable Convert.ChangeType null conversion to Nullable<T> value type #96216
  • Pauseless Garbage Collector (Question) #96213
  • FilesystemWatcher ObjectDisposedException at the ConfigurationBuilder.Build() on the WinForms project .net8 #96212
  • SqlServer.Types is 20% slower on .NET 8 #96211
  • Executing http request in node-wasm does not work anymore #96210
  • Support Tar with large entry size #96209
  • Unix Console SetWindowSize implementation #96208
  • [AssemblyLoadContext]: Restriction dlls for new Plugins #96207
  • String comparison regression bug #96205

Closed

  • Performance decrease when using interfaces #7291
    Future
  • [wasm] AOT: `System.Globalization.Calendars.Hybrid.WASM.Tests` and `System.Globalization.Hybrid.WASM.Tests` getting terminated #94225
  • JIT: Missing zero initialization of stackallocs converted to locals for "init mem" mismatches during inlining #95056
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT stackalloc returning garbage in AggressiveInlining method #96174
    9.0.0
  • Unnecessary call to `CORINFO_HELP_RNGCHKFAIL` with subtraction and bitwise and #96046
    9.0.0
  • DllImport with SuppressGCTransition causes PAL_SEHException with a hosted runtime in release configuration. #94029
  • ilc.exe is not passed arguments #95997
  • Set up illink test jobs #12914
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] No usable version of libssl was found on linux-bionic-arm64 #96184
  • GC kicks in too late, eventually leads to OOM in Linux #12738
    Future
  • Introduce default value for OptimizationPreference #92312
  • .NET7 NativeAOT worked for us right before updating today to .NET8, now NativeAOT is breaking on an error. #94744
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Intrinsify typeof(T).IsPrimitive #96226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Explicit zeroing for stackalloc if inlined into a caller without LocalsInit #96220
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Tweak new API template #96217
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Enable more MT PLinq areas #96215
    area-System.Linq.Parallel
  • Add Arm64 encodings for SVE IF_SVE_CQ_4A_A & IF_SVE_GE_4A group #96214
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Revert "Revert "Error out if SelfContained is not specified for Native AOT publish"" #96206
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Small tweak for branch optimizer #95740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Temporarily disable PerfBDN app testing on main #96222
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • superpmi: fix failureLimit #96202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] [PERF] Update osx.1015 queue to osx.13 queue. #96149
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] [PERF] Update osx.1015 queue to osx.13 queue. #96148
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [aot][browser] Stop throwing in CultureInfo getter #95910
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Explicit zeroing for stackalloc if inlined into a caller without LocalsInit #96180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: remove bound check for negated ranges #96123
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Manually optimize a rem 64 instruction to avoid regression on Mono #96203
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, runtime-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix unhandled exception with no managed frames #96138
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] introduce JSProxyContext #95959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][browser] Fix WASM README path #96198
    area-Build-mono
  • Longer item expiry for debug builds in System.Runtime.Caching.Tests #96186
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, community-contribution

Updated

  • [RISC-V] Simplify codegen for div/mod #96068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add runtime module address to SpecialDiagInfo block in createdump and fix missing DotNetRuntimeDebugHeader export #96121
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Fix ProcessWaitingTests.WaitChain and ProcessWaitingTests.Wa… #96187
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, test-enhancement, community-contribution, arch-riscv, 9.0.0
  • Fix `CopyStringDictionary` #96093
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • New exception handling diagnostic fixes #96065
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix JitOptRepeat #94250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64: Add IF_SVE_DT_3A, IF_SVE_DU_3A, IF_SVE_DX_3A, IF_SVE_DY_3A #96201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix crash when processing aliases that do not point at names #96048
    area-System.Text.Json, source-generator
  • Various no-diff cleanups and debugging additions/fixes #96200
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge remaining JIT tests #94444
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Reduce use of madvise DODUMP/DONTDUMP #95643
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Replaced string concatenation by StringBuilder usage #95760
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Implement more APIs in new TypeBuilder, fix bugs found during testing #95753
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [ILLink analyzer] Move generic parameter analysis to dataflow #95482
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Adding osx-arm64 Mono Interpreter runtime tests job to extra-platforms #96023
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • A few optimizations for the gcinfodecoder construction #96150
    tenet-performance, area-VM-coreclr
  • Arm64: reduce switch sizes in emitIns_R_R_R #96192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Support library mode with NativeAOT on iOS-like platforms #93658
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser] Document `DebuggerSupport` for non-debug configurations #95262
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Console.Unix: fix ANSI colors over redirected standard output. #95654
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix bug in label printing in disasm #96136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use a sorted module order for metadata generation #96168
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Make sorting of modules more stable in the compiler #96167
    Servicing-consider, area-crossgen2-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Wasm components as replacement for lower level, e.g. libc implementations. Such as HTTP/time/random #2468

PullRequests

Created

  • Benchmark of interaction between async1 and async2 #2469

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DOTNET PUBLISH doesn't add tags on docker container when using an environment variable that contains multiple tags #37610
  • ImplicitUsings adds usings for both WPF and WinForms if UseWindowsForms is enabled in a WPF project #37608
  • Containers: extend environment variables for passing registry credentials #37606
  • Remote iOS builds fail as the `dotnet publish` command doesn't find where Mono is installed on target #37605

PullRequests

Created

  • Base version #37625
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Swap 9.0 to current target framework #37609
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Permit setting whether to use workload sets or loose manifests Fixes #34561 #37346
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Pass SelfContained=true in CheckIlcVersions #37474
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

Updated

  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Extensions #5497

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove ServiceHub PackageReferences #71374
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Scripting throws exception in .Net 8 Standalone Blazor Wasm #71371
  • InvalidProgramException when returning a ref field assignment in a property #71369

Closed

  • Can not get compilation object for web aplications #71302
  • Roslyn SemanticModel symbol resolution not working reliably #71370
  • IDE0028 suggests to refactor empty collection expressions #71245

PullRequests

Created

  • Offer use-collection-expr when targeting interfaces #71373
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [Draft] LSP Public API #71372
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Use new helper type for initializing a value type field only once, and in a threadsafe manner. #71013
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • IOperation - drop synthesized conversion placed on top of params collections #71325
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Simplify code for checking assignments #71368
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue when using a collection expr within object/collection intializers #71367
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add error logging to RequestContext #71366
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Extract compilation-tracker/SG-production code out of SolutionState to a new owner. #71257
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and… #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Inline Rename] Update the UI related to Copilot #71332
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • WIP. Indenting string builder with generator #71364
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use runtime helper `CreateSpan` for `stackalloc` of non-byte arrays #71261
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Add handling of params collections for natural delegate types #71334
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Do not compile all types during ENC #71254
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add razor diagnostic endpoint #71365
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide full `updateTypes` to MetadataUpdateHandlers #52937
  • Perf regression: plaintext #52936
  • Implement WebAssembly (WASM) Support for Improved Frontend Performance #52934
  • Does [AsParameters] properly propagate documentation via ApiExplorer? #52931
  • [Feature] Generate multiple Razor Pages css isolation bundles #52927
  • InteractiveServer with prerender incorrectly waits for the completion of OnInitializedAsync #52926
  • C# try catch is not working, application crashes after exception #52925
  • Perf regression: json #52924
  • Proposal for UI-Driven Type Refactoring Tool Using Tag #52922
  • AuthorizeView non-functional with InteractiveServer and Windows (Negotiate) Auth #52921
  • Blazor component AuthorizeView can accept the AuthorizationPolicy combine function result. #52920
  • Support for Blazor Events in Blazor SSR. #52919

Closed

  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #52870
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #52923
  • NET8: DefaultObjectPool<T>.Get() method returns null under multi-threads, seems not thread-safe with NET8 and throws exception, while no problem with NET7 #52873
  • Bring back stateful prerendering #46401
    Planning: WebUI
  • Split blazor.web.js into dynamically-loadable bundles #48771
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Improved model for preserving persistent component state #46995
    Planning: WebUI
  • Circular references are not supported, take two #20525
    Planning: WebUI
  • Allow JSON-LD Scripts (error RZ9992: Script tags should not be placed inside components) #37230
    Planning: WebUI
  • Log a warning if event callbacks are registered on non-interactive components #50047
    Planning: WebUI
  • Inject CMS Content to Razor Components at compile time #50817
    Planning: WebUI
  • RazorComponentResult returned component cannot execute clientside code #50762
    Planning: WebUI
  • Map Razor Components collides with MapFallbackToPage #50816
    Planning: WebUI
  • Unclear error when incompatible JavaScript included on page (but works in SSR) #51010
    Planning: WebUI
  • [.NET 8] Page Title not being applied when using WebAssembly PreRender=false #52090
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor: Can `NavigateTo` and `href=` be used without interfering with each other? #52705
  • EventCallbackFactory has wrong nullability annotations for all callback parameters. #52872
  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50220
  • Perf regression: json, json #52883
  • Blazor hosted wasm dependent assembly loading issue in 7.0.9 #49685
    Planning: WebUI
  • ANCM crashes with shadow copy enabled and the new deployment deleted a directory #48233
    9.0-preview1
  • Blazor Form Validation Input elements initially rendered with class valid #27113
    .NET 9 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Add explicit null checks on ObjectPool.Return rather than triggering random failures later on #52935
    area-networking
  • Speed up ILEmitTrie jump table using Binary Search Tree #52928
    community-contribution, area-networking

Merged

  • Revert "Disable source index build step (#51710)" #52933
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix shadow copy up to date check on startup #52831
    feature-iis, area-networking, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty and ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #52897
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [Infrastructure] Move back to NPM #52914
    area-infrastructure
  • Avoid setting incompatible default value for StringValue sources #52895
    feature-rdg, area-networking
  • Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52823
    area-blazor
  • Using FrozenDictionaries in IEndpointAddressScheme implementations #52854
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add ShortCircuitAttribute #52571
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Add null check for connectionId #52672
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Use CreateAsyncScope instead of CreateScope for ExceptionHandler middleware #52687
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix misdetection of component comments #52744
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • #52067 input number range type #52747
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Test failure] Quarantine Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IIS.FunctionalTests.StartupTests.WrongApplicationPath_FailedToRun #52890
    area-networking
  • Skip failing Libuv test on Alpine #52912
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, area-networking, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell TabBar didn't follow styling ules like describdes in documentation #19530
  • Inaccurate results when getting the user's screen dimensions for macOS #19526
  • Using PublishAot results in a nuget package not found error #19524
  • Integrated Hello World Maui startup project crashes after splashscreen on iOS 16.5.1 and .NET8.0 in release mode. #19522
  • RadioButton TextColor not applying on MacOS and iOS in MAUI #19520
  • Html styling is not applying to Label on Windows #19519
  • so many times i have installed in my windows 11 i am getting this errors #19518
  • ScrollView's scroll position is not notified correctly on Android. #19515
    Backlog
  • Soft Keyboard Dismiss issues on Android #19514
  • HorizontalStackLayout Crashes Debugger on Negative Spacing #19513
  • PlatformBehaviour OnAttachedTo not called for ImageButtons with both HeightRequest and WidthRequest set on iOS #19511

Closed

  • Button with image does not autosize on iOS when text is changed. #19495
  • StrictMode violation in `ShellSectionRenderer.OnCreateView()` leading to 8-second blocking during startup #19415
  • `ObjectDisposedException` in `MauiRecyclerView.TearDownOldElement` on Android #19516
  • Integrate Biometric Authentication Support in .NET MAUI #19527
  • Linear Gradients constantly have a grey hue in .net Maui on iOS #14766
    Backlog
  • [Testing] iOS compatibility tests currently failing on main #19343
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Settings `-p:MauiXamlCValidateOnly=False` not working on `Debug` configuration #10844
    Backlog
  • [ci] Add ci integration for net9.0 branch #19254
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [ci] Enable APIScan #19396
    .NET 8 SR2
  • .NET MAUI project using the PDF.js library - Issue loading the PDF from iOS resource #19486

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix page swap from background #19532
  • iOS/CollectionView - Remove GetSizeForItem and use newer AutomaticSize #19529
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/gestures

Merged

  • [iOS] Fix wrong gray color using transparent in iOS gradients #17696
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Add design time converters #19301
    area/Xaml </>
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19510
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.4 to 4.3.3 #19394
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [ci] Move to new compliance task #19475
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [X] Warn on non compiled bindings #19360
    area/perf 🏎️

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix Flyout layout #19125
    area/shell 🐢
  • Clean up async assertions #19385
  • [Android] Fix RefreshView loading indicator position #17647
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • [testing] Enable a way to test on real devices #19492
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix discovering iOS 17 simulators on CI #19501
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Avoid zero-length array allocations #19300
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [net8.0] Update with main #19381
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Removed vestigial UpdateContentLayout() method left over from Forms #18856
    area/layout 🔲, partner/android
  • Invalidate Shapes BackgroundColor #18183
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, stale
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Testing] Add legacy ScrollView UITests #19054
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, layout-scrollview, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Testing] Added appium UITest for FlyoutNavigationBetweenItemsWithNavigationStacks #19444
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #19472
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [Housekeeping] Added UI Test to validate project template #18567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, stale
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D24 #18713
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Guid property raises a System.NullReferenceException #32653
  • Possible memory leak when use PooledDbContextFactory #32652

Closed

  • RelationalTypeMapping | Method not found #32644
  • DataTable.Load() fails when joining SQLite tables with UNIQUE constraint #30765
    9.0.0
  • Bug at DataTable.Load(dataReader) when result have NULL value on joined column #29744
    9.0.0
  • Scaffolding with use-database-names and events table generates invalid code #31121
    9.0.0
  • Allow generated class members to have same name as generated classes when casing differs #30237
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix T4 files for VS 17.8 #32651

Merged

  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Don't assume nullabilty or uniqueness of projected columns #32648
  • Singulaize before checking for CSharp name conflicts #32641
  • Additional testing transforming the database model to the IModel that will then be used for scaffolding #32631
  • Allow generated class members to have same name as generated classes when casing differs #32629

Updated

  • Properly support LEAST/GREATEST over nullable value types #32458
  • Refactor queryable collection support for non-relational providers #32506
  • Break up KeyDiscoveryConvention #32650

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
